perturbation.original_text: If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter, Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of all amounts previously paid hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text: If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter, Bank of America may terminate this Schedule. Refunds for previously paid amounts, if any, will be determined at the sole discretion of the Supplier.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that Bank of America 'shall receive a refund' if the price increases. The modified text introduces uncertainty by stating that refunds, 'if any, will be determined at the sole discretion of the Supplier,' contradicting the initial guarantee of a refund.

perturbation.original_text: The Customizations shall fulfill or exceed all of the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below.
perturbation.changed_text: The Customizations shall fulfill or exceed all of the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below. However, the Supplier reserves the right to deviate from these specifications if deemed necessary for technical reasons.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that the customizations *shall* fulfill or exceed specifications. The added sentence gives the Supplier leeway to deviate from those specifications, creating a contradiction. It is now uncertain whether the supplier must adhere to specifications or not.

perturbation.original_text: Bank of America wishes to obtain the Customizations herein defined, and Supplier wishes to delivery those Customizations, on the terms and conditions of the Agreement and this Customization Schedule.
perturbation.changed_text: Bank of America wishes to obtain the Customizations herein defined, and Supplier wishes to delivery those Customizations, on the terms and conditions of the Agreement and this Customization Schedule. However, the Supplier is not obligated to deliver the Customizations if unforeseen circumstances arise.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states a mutual wish for the supplier to deliver customizations. By adding that the supplier is not obligated to deliver under unforeseen circumstances, the modified text creates a conflict. This weakens Bank of America's expectations of delivery and creates an in-text contradiction to whether customizations will occur at all.
